Name: Maximize Project Delivery Speed
Description: Deliver project increments as quickly as possible

Name: Minimize Task Blockers
Description: Reduce the number and impact of blockers during the sprint

Name: Maximize Team Velocity
Description: Achieve the highest average story points per sprint

Name: Minimize Sprint Overrun
Description: Keep sprint duration within planned limits

Name: Maximize Feature Completion
Description: Complete as many high-priority features as possible per sprint

Name: Maximize Skill Utilization

Name: Minimize Budget Overrun
Description: Keep project budget usage within planned limits

Name: Maximize Stakeholder Satisfaction
Description: Ensure high stakeholder participation and positive feedback in sprint reviews

Name: Minimize Task Rework
Description: Reduce the amount of work that needs to be redone due to defects or blockers

Name: Maximize Team Satisfaction
Description: Improve team morale and satisfaction as reported in retrospectives
